name: Mallard Mountain
description:
Banjo-Kazooie meets Watership down

Mallard Mountain is a 3D platformer where you rescue ducks from an unnatural disaster.

A game of hide & seek goes wrong, which Maurice and Mallary needs to save their friends.

The Plot:
Smelly humans exploit nature by chopping down too many trees causing the soil to destabilize.

This triggers a landslide that rips through the ducks’ home.

By chance, Mallary and Maurice are spared by the landslide, but their friends are missing. The duo set out to find and rescue the other ducks before journeying up the mountain to find a new home at the top of Mallard Mountain.
